t: Psalm 118
Thanksgiving for Victory
Give*pn thanks to the Lord,*s for he is good; his*ln faithful love endures forever.
Let*ln Israel say, “His*ln faithful love endures forever.”
Let*ln the house of Aaron say, “His*ln faithful love endures forever.”
Let*ln those who fear the Lord*s say, “His*ln faithful love endures forever.”
I*pn called to the Lord*s in distress; the*ln Lord*s answered me and*ln put me in a spacious place.
The*ln Lord*s is for me; I will not be afraid. What*ln can a mere mortal do to me?
The*ln Lord*s is my helper; therefore,*ln I will look in triumph on those who hate me.
It*pn is better to take refuge in the Lord*s than*ln to trust in humanity.
It*ln is better to take refuge in the Lord*s than*ln to trust in nobles.
All*pn the nations surrounded me; in*ln the name of the Lord*s I destroyed them.
They*ln surrounded me, yes, they surrounded me; in*ln the name of the Lord*s I destroyed them.
They*ln surrounded me like bees; they*ln were extinguished like a fire among thorns; in*ln the name of the Lord*s I destroyed them.
They*ln pushed me hard to make me fall, but*ln the Lord*s helped me.

Open*pn the gates of righteousness for me; I*ln will enter through them and*ln give thanks to the Lord.*s
This*ln is the Lord’s*s gate; the*ln righteous will enter through it.
I*ln will give thanks to you because*ln you have answered me and*ln have become my salvation.

This*ln came from the Lord;*s it*ln is wondrous in our sight.
This*ln is the day the Lord*s has made; let’s*ln rejoice and be glad in it.

The*ln Lord*s is God and has given us light. Bind*ln the festival sacrifice with cords to*ln the horns of the altar.
